body:
Concept ACK.

For "psbt: Add explicit copy operator as default" commit (108f285f76aa5ae803303c329474035c89921f93) there is another solution: 5b2bb0fd3af34463bb382b473cc8b6dee65c0920

> For "psbt: Add explicit copy operator as default" commit (108f285) there is another solution: 5b2bb0f

If all is the same, removing code is strictly better than adding it. If you're sure that is correct (that that's exactly what the compiler generates implicitly), I'll pull in that one.

> "some compilers" is kind of vague. It was added by @ryanofsky in [79d579f](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/79d579f4e11b57f90fed314bccd25230f918729f) (#14437). Can you elaborate which compilers need this?

Commented https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16992#issuecomment-536634398

ACK 0515216a9ce55d4faa531c350128b2628391705e, tested on Fedora 30:

```bash
$ gcc --version | grep gcc
gcc (GCC) 9.2.1 20190827 (Red Hat 9.2.1-1)
$ git checkout master 
$ make clean && make 2>~/master
$ git checkout pr16995
$ make clean && make 2>~/pr16995
$ diff ~/master ~/pr16995 
6,23d5
< In file included from /usr/include/string.h:494,
<                  from ./serialize.h:20,
<                  from ./netaddress.h:13,
<                  from ./protocol.h:13,
<                  from protocol.cpp:6:
< In function âchar* strncpy(char*, const char*, size_t)â,
<     inlined from âCMessageHeader::CMessageHeader(const unsigned char (&)[4], const char*, unsigned int)â at protocol.cpp:91:12:
< /usr/include/bits/string_fortified.h:106:34: warning: âchar* __builtin_strncpy(char*, const char*, long unsigned int)â specified bound 12 equals destination size [-Wstringop-truncation]
<   106 |   return __builtin___strncpy_chk (__dest, __src, __len, __bos (__dest));
<       |          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
< psbt.cpp: In function âTransactionError CombinePSBTs(PartiallySignedTransaction&, const std::vector<PartiallySignedTransaction>&)â:
< psbt.cpp:335:19: warning: implicitly-declared âPartiallySignedTransaction& PartiallySignedTransaction::operator=(const PartiallySignedTransaction&)â is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-copy]
<   335 |     out = psbtxs[0]; // Copy the first one
<       |                   ^
< In file included from psbt.cpp:5:
< ./psbt.h:398:5: note: because âPartiallySignedTransactionâ has user-provided âPartiallySignedTransaction::PartiallySignedTransaction(const PartiallySignedTransaction&)â
<   398 |     PartiallySignedTransaction(const PartiallySignedTransaction& psbt_in) : tx(psbt_in.tx), inputs(psbt_in.inputs), outputs(psbt_in.outputs), unknown(psbt_in.unknown) {}
<       |     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

DISCLAIMER: My ACK is for 4da0a262e7a2323335d78ae376dde38513eee0e2 commit, not for my own 0515216a9ce55d4faa531c350128b2628391705e.
